Entries.marriage_Tue.000: Ahoy, my little angelfish. Whaddaya need?$h
Entries.marriage_Thu.000: I'll be home early today, angelfish. Don't miss me too much.
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: I'll be headin' to the saloon when I'm done here, skipper. You should come along.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: Ah, what a great way to relax. I'm glad you're here, skipper.$h
